The following tables have been prepared for the purpose of affording the pupil material for study and comparison, by group- ing together under appropriate heads examples of certain eon- structions as they actually occur in this book. It is expected that they will be helpful to the student in two ways· (1) by sup- plementing and illustrating the notes, and (2) by affording him guides which 116 may follow in his writing 61 Latin.
